meanings.definition: To create or perform an anthem.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys antheming at church every Sunday.
meanings.sent2: The choir will be antheming at the concert tonight.
meanings.sent3: The children were antheming happily in the school play.
meanings.sent4: His voice anthemed through the halls, filling them with joy.
meanings.sent5: Antheming together creates a sense of unity and pride.

meanings.definition: The act of singing or composing anthems.
meanings.sent1: The antheming during the ceremony was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She studied the history of antheming in music class.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best antheming group was fierce.
meanings.sent4: His love for antheming was evident in every note he sang.
meanings.sent5: The antheming echoed through the stadium, moving the audience.

meanings.definition: The process of selecting or adopting an anthem.
meanings.sent1: The antheming of the national anthem was a proud moment.
meanings.sent2: They discussed the antheming of a new song for the event.
meanings.sent3: The committee's antheming of the theme song took hours.

meanings.sent5: Their antheming of the school song brought back fond memories.
